title: After the miracle
brief_description: A broad view of life in Israel in 1966. Covers economic and social development and some problems; the settling of millions of immigrants, the continuous threat of invasion, the lack of natural resources. Discusses the active and varied religious and political life, and the advanced state of science and technology
